title: Regal Quebec Resort with 27-Hole Golf Course, Three Restaurants & Wellness Spa
description:
Enjoy an elegant escape in Quebec with a stay at a regal chateau-style resort, majestically perched on a cliff overlooking the St Lawrence River. This opulent retreat boasts 405 rooms and suites, each offering breathtaking views of Charlevoix, a UNESCO World Biosphere Reserve.

Savour the region's culinary delights across three restaurants, renowned for farm-to-table philosophy, or enjoy a round of golf on the award-winning 27-hole course designed by Darrell Huxham. After a day of exploration, retreat to the resort's Moment Spa for a rejuvenating treatment, or take a dip in either of the two heated pools.
offer_address: 181 Rue Richelieu, Charlevoix, Quebec G5A 1X7, Canada
